message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for only $75. It's a great opportunity to get it at a discount!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $75 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend. I'd be willing to pay $70 for it. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. Considering your offer, I would like to counter with $72 for the product. This still offers you a good deal while ensuring we cover our costs.
